participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and sociable, but struggles with commitment in relationships.
participant_1.background: i like to spend my money on cars. i go to the gym most days just to socialize. i work from home. i watch too much tv in spare time. i have never had a steady relationship.

participant_2.name: Lila
participant_2.personality: Creative and introverted, deeply passionate about technology and gaming.
participant_2.background: i am a famous twitch streamer. i helped design the game starcraft. i'm a recluse. i've an allergy to water. i'm working on a building a robot to be my body double.

content.text: i wish i had time for that but i have to save money for a car
